title: Propose Magicland integration into MCN Multiple Farming Ecosystem
body:
Magicland is an emerging sustainable decentralized one-stop DeFI portal that starts with yield farming powered on Arbitrium and IoTeX.

Magicland's focus is to provide a safe yield farming experience for our citizens who are supporting Magicland along the journey to become the most magical DeFI place on Arbitrum and IoTeX.

Magicland's vision is to create a long-lasting DeFI protocol on the Arbitrum and IoTeX where both the Magicland and its citizens will grow together to witness the rise of Arbitrum in gaining the iron chair of the L2 war and IoTeX growing its unique strength and user base.

Thus, MCN proposes Magicland to be integrated into MCN Multiple Farming Ecosystem as a key resource for the yield farming platform. We believe Magicland is a long-term key player that will empower MCN's vision as a multi-chain ecosystem incubator and investment.
author: 0x7fA12C4B388732411Cb92ea5BB1237f0520eBc53
